fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article (West coast mainline train services to be rebranded as Avanti, 28 November, page 47) said that Pendolino trains were going to be phased out from 2022. In fact it is older Voyager models that will be phased out. • Half of the 10 highest tides recorded in Venice have been in the last 20 years, not all of those 10 as an editorial said (Venice, one of humanity’s glorious achievements, must not be allowed to die, 23 November, page 2, Journal). • Other recently corrected articles include: ‘There’s a new level of anger’: the women fighting to end the ‘rough sex’ defence Grenfell cladding firm has spent £30m defending its role in disaster ‘Twitter blackface’: Why Michael Gove’s Stormzy comments are so egregious The Guardian view on Boris Johnson and the NHS: a problem of trust
